pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; shoes plus socks. Follow manufacturer’s instructions for cleaning and maintaining PPE. If no such instructions for washables exist, use detergent and hot water. Keep and wash PPE separately from other laundry.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed. Prolonged or frequently repeated skin contact may cause allergic reaction in some individuals.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 32 fl oz per acre per year
Application_Info.application_Method: full coverage spray to the foliage
